loans.name: Candido Humberto

texts.es: Don Cándido siempre con su labor de hacer colchones quien para mantener su negocio ha hecho barios prestamos a afodenic para invertirlos en materia prima, misma razón por la que está solicitando nuevamente apoyo de crédito a Afodenic y Kiva con los que está muy agradecido, para comprar 4 camionadas de tela, estampada y liza, con esta pequeña inversión su propósito es seguir vendiendo como siempre para ayudar a sus 2 hijos a que sigan estudiando y que lo aprovechen al máximo mientras él tenga salud y trabajo los va a poyar como padre soltero que es, hasta verlos independientes y se puedan valer por si solos, su sueño más grande es poder ampliar su taller para expandir su producto en el mercado, cabe mencionar que don Cándido es de profesión administrador de empresa pero le es más rentable su trabajo como costurero y hacer colchones para el beneficio de su familia.
texts.en: Cándido is always working, making mattresses, and has been keeping his business going with the help of loans through AFODENIC and using the money to buy supplies.  This is why he is requesting another loan through AFRODEC and Kiva.  He is very grateful and will use the money to buy four bolts of printed and solid fabric.  This small investment will allow him to keep selling so that he can help his two children continue studying.  He wants to take advantage of being healthy and will continue supporting them, as the single father he is, until they are on their own and can support themselves.  His greatest dream is to expand his workshop so that he can have more merchandise in the market.   Cándido is a manager at another company, but his mattress job is more profitable and benefits his family better.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La Sra. Antonia, vive en la ciudad de Encarnación, es casada vive en casa propia, tiene 4 hijos, por quienes ella lucha incansablemente para poder darles todo lo que necesitan para tener una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Antonia es dueña de una despensa y carnicería bien surtida hace mas de 10 años, aparte de su despensa su marido se dedica al faenamiento de vacas de donde se auto abastece para su negocio con los mejores cortes de carnes. Esta pareja lucha por su familia, y están pidiendo una oportunidad para poder seguir creciendo, ya que solicitan de este crédito para la compra de insumos para la despensa, ya que se acerca la navidad y fin de año que es el tiempo donde más vende, y es por eso que quiere tener bien lleno su negocio. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Antonia lives in the city of Encarnación, is married, lives in her own home, has 4 children. She works hard and tirelessly to be able to give them everything that they need to have a good life without privations. 

Antonia is the owner of a food store and butcher shop for the past ten years. Apart from her store, her husband works in the sanitary sacrifice of cows where he self sustains his business with the best cuts of meat. 

This couple works hard for their family and they are asking for the opportunity to continue to grow. They are asking for a loan for the purchase of inputs for the store now that Christmas and the end of the year is approaching which is the time period when they sell the most. For this reason they want to have their business stocked. They are grateful for the opportunity they are given since this will be of great help.

loans.use: to purchase inputs for the store

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
Doctor de profesión y por vocación, Edwin de 42 años aun sin casarse y sin tener hijos, apoya a través de su trabajo a sus padres quienes en una edad avanzada muestran un gran orgullo por su él. A manera de reflejar su esfuerzo abnegado logró adquirir hace poco un lote en donde construyó una vivienda a base de adobe. Luego de haber culminado sus estudios superiores, optó hace 9 años establecerse en su localidad, en donde labora como medico obstetra en el centro de salud. Para él, la vida es lo que importa, por tanto participa participa  en obras en favor de la salud de la población, siendo éste un gran aliento y motivación que justifica su vocación de servicio.
A manera de apoyar constante y directamente a la población de escasos recursos logró junto a otro compañero suyo fundar  una pequeña botica en donde expenden diversos medicamentos con precios reducidos en beneficio de la población mas humilde y solo captando ganancias regulares, llevándose así la satisfacción de ser participe de una labor social que realiza de manera incondicional.
Actualmetne posee una botica, y por ello desea abastecerlo de medicamentos actuales, para ello necesita de capital. Pero su mayor aspiración es reunir a un grupo de colegas y juntos fundar un policlinico o centro de salud en donde espera seguir apoyando a personas de bajos recursos. Ahora necesita de 1,000 nuevos soles para comprar medicamentos y cumplir con la demanda que tiene.
texts.en:
A doctor by profession and by calling, 42-year-old Edwin is not married yet and doesn't have any children. Through his work, he supports his parents, who are very proud of him in their advanced age. His dedication and effort are evidenced by the fact that he recently managed to acquire a lot on which he built a house out of adobe. 

Nine years ago, after finishing college, he chose to settle in the town where he now works as an obstetrician in the healthcare center. For him, life is what matters, so he participates in projects to promote public health. This work is a great inspiration and motivation and fulfills his desire to serve others.

In order to consistently and directly support the low-income population, he and one of his colleagues together founded a small pharmacy where they sell various medications at reduced prices to benefit the poorest population. They receive only their regular wages; they take satisfaction in being part of an effort to help people, which they do wholeheartedly.

Currently, Edwin has the pharmacy and he would like to stock it with currently available medications; for this, he needs capital. His greatest aspiration is to gather a group of colleagues and together found a clinic or healthcare center where he would continue helping disadvantaged people. At this time, he needs 1,000 nuevos soles (PEN) to buy medications so he can meet existing demand.

loans.use: to buy medications.

loans.name: Mujeres Al Poder Group

texts.es:
El comité es un grupo muy activo, y a pesar de tener algunos inconvenientes siempre supieron salir adelante . El grupo se encuentra en el ciclo 8º , en estos momentos estan con más ganas que nunca de trabajar, para poder ayudar a sus familias.
La Sra.  Mirna, una de las miembros, es la presidenta del grupo , y siempre sabe  llevar bien adelante su puesto ya que es muy estricta y a la vez comprensiva, ella es comerciante tiene despensa y también trabaja en una empresa de calzados como operaria de producción, cuenta Mirna que su sueño es poder agrandar su negocio y así seguir trabajando para dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos en general para su despensa, y de esa forma tener bien surtido su negocio.
texts.en:
The bank is a very active group and they always got ahead, despite a few problems.  The group is in its eighth cycle.  Currently they want to work more than ever to be able to help their families.

One of the members, Mirna, is the president of the group.  She always knows how to carry through with her position because she's very strict, but at the same time she's understanding.  She's a merchant.  She has a store and she also works in a shoe company as a production operator.  Mirna says her dream is to be able to expand her business to continue working to give her family everything they need.  She's a very hardworking and enterprising person.

She's requesting this loan to buy general supplies for her store so her business is well stocked.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Sarangoo

texts.en:
Mrs. Sarangoo, 24 years old, lives with her husband in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The couple runs a handicraft business, and before shifting to a private business they had been working as hand-crafters in an art company for two years. They use waste materials to craft their products, and it has a positive impact on the environment. 

As winter comes to Mongolia, their newly built house is vulnerable to strong wind and frost, so she is requesting the loan of 6,000,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) to buy construction materials and a low-pressure cooker, which cooks food faster than conventional pans, thus preserving energy. A high-quality house after the repair will stop heat loss and preserve energy. All these are great contributions to the environmental protection efforts.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to protect her house from strong wind and frost.

loans.name: Marie Gorette

texts.en: Marie Gorette is aged 36. She sells juices and fresh milk. She has been in the business for two years. With the loan, she wants to buy more juices for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more juices and milk fresh for sale.

loans.name: Durim

texts.en:
Durim is a 42-year-old Romani man who lives in a major south central city of Albania. He is married with two school-aged children, and is a proud father because his children, unlike others in his community, go to school. Durim lived in Greece with his family for a long time and worked in trades like masonry.  He has been back in his birth country for the past two years and continues to practice masonry. In addition, he has begun buying and selling new household items, which he has seen to be a very profitable activity.

Durim is requesting his first loan in the amount of 150,000 Albanian lek to buy inventory of new items such as drapes, blankets and sheets. He is confident that he will do well, because this is not a new business for him. The first thing Durim did when he started the interview for this loan description was to thank Kiva lenders and express his willingness to wait patiently for their help.

loans.use: to purchase inventory such as drapes, sheets and blankets.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is from the Terjola district of West Georgia. He is 20 years old and lives with his retired grandparents. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, they run a small dairy farm with four milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese products. The cheese is sold at the local open market. In addition, George has a vineyard and sells grapes seasonally. He does all of the relevant agricultural work to ensure a good harvest. Besides this, George has five sheep and sells lambs. 

He is very hard-working young man, with a great desire to get ahead. George wants to make some improvements and repairs to his old house, but the amount of money he has isn't enough, so he is requesting a loan to cover the costs of repairing the house such as changing windows, painting, etc. Taking this loan will create for George and his family suitable living conditions and enable them to enjoy living in their house.

loans.use: to renovate his house.

loans.name: Abahujumugambi Twese / Rbv Group

texts.fr:
Julienne est mariée. Elle fait partie du groupe solidaire nommé ABAHUJUMUGAMBI TWESE / RBVqui fait l’agriculture des ognons.  Elle est âgée de 38 ans, elle a 6 enfants dont le plus âgé a 20 ans et le moins âgé a 2 ans. 5  de ses enfants  vont à l’école et aucune autre personne n’est en sa charge. Madame Julienne est née au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est de quatre ans de l’école secondaire.
Elle a commencé avec ACB Ltd en 2012 et est au 2ème cycle de crédit. Son historique de remboursement est sain.
Avec le crédit lui octroyé, elle va acheter des engrais chimiques et paiera les ouvriers avec la partie restante. Elle n’attend aucune difficulté de non remboursement.  L’utilisation du système moderne d’utilisation des engrais chimiques est la stratégie qu’elle va utiliser pouvoir accroitre son agriculture.  Son ambition est d’être une grossiste. Pour sa famille, elle va assurer l’éducation de ses enfants jusqu’au niveau universitaire.  Elle va acheter la maison pour sa famille. A part de l’agriculture, elle fait le commerce des habits.
texts.en:
Julienne is married and belongs to the Abahujumugambi Twese/RBV solidarity group which grows onions. She is 38 years old and has six children, the eldest of whom is 20 years old and the youngest two. Five of her children go to school and she does not have any other dependents. Julienne was born in Rwanda and has four years of secondary education.

She joined ACB Ltd in 2012 and is on her second loan; she has a healthy repayment record. With the loan she has been granted she is going to buy chemical fertilizers and use the rest of the money to pay for labor. She does not expect to have any difficulties with the repayments. Her strategy is to use the modern chemical fertilizer system to develop her farming business. Her ambition is to become a wholesaler. As for her family, she is going to ensure that her children are educated up to university level and she is going to buy a house for her family. Apart from farming, she also sells clothes.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pay for labor, and buy chemical fertilizers.

loans.name: Déogratias

texts.fr:
Monsieur Déogratias est marié, âgé de 50 ans et père de 7 enfants dont le plus âgé a 30 ans et le moins âgé a 7 ans. Trois de ses enfants vont à l’école et a une autre personne en sa charge.
Il est né au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de l’école secondaire (humanité).
Il a adhéré à ACB Ltd en 2010 et est au 2ème cycle de crédit. Le premier crédit est remboursé sans irrégularité.
Avec le crédit lui octroyé, il va acheter les tôles, le ciment, les clous pour réhabiliter sa maison d’habitation. Ce crédit lui permettra de payer la main d’œuvre des maçons et aides maçons qui ont réhabilité sa maison.
Ça peut lui être difficile de rembourser ce prêt si et seulement si les mauvaises conditions climatiques interviennent. Ceci parce que la plus part de ses revenus viennent de l’agriculture.
Monsieur Déogratias est un pasteur salarié.
texts.en:
Déogratis is married, 50 years old and father to seven children, the eldest of whom is 30 years old and the youngest seven. Three of his children go to school and he has one other dependent. He was born in Rwanda and has six years of secondary education (humanities).

He joined ACB Ltd in 20102 and is on his second loan. He repaid the first loan without any problems. With the loan he has been granted he is going to buy sheets of metal, cement and nails to renovate his house. This loan will enable him to pay the builders and their mates for their labor in renovating the house. 

It could be difficult for him to repay this loan if, and only if there are bad weather conditions. This is because the bulk of his income comes from farming. 

Déogratias is employed as a pastor.

loans.use: to buy sheets of metal, cement, nails and to pay builders and builders' mates.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 2 boxes of spaghetti, 1 box of matches, 2 boxes of soap and a box of canned tomatoes.

loans.name: Théodora's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe composé de deux femmes en caution solidaire. Agée de 53ans, Théodora la responsable est divorcée et mère de 05enfants qui sont déjà à leur propre charge. Le plus âgé et le moins âgé ont respectivement 34ans et 22ans. Elle a une boutique où elle vend des céréales, des boîtes de conserve, de mayonnaise, des paquets de spaghetti, de biscuites et d'autres articles depuis quelques années. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin et de l'extérieur. Dans le but d'accroître son chiffre d'affaire et de répondre favorablement à la demande de ses clients, Théodora a sollicité et a obtenu un concours financier à Finadev en vue de maximiser son intérêt et d'agrandir son fonds de commerce. Théodora se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en:
This is a group made up of 2 women who are joint guarantors. Théodora, the leader, is 53 years old, divorced and the mother of 5 children who are already independent. The eldest and youngest child are 34 and 22 years old respectively.

Théodora has a shop in which she has been selling cereals, canned goods, mayonnaise, packets of spaghetti, biscuits and other items for several years. She gets her supplies at one of Benin's markets, and from abroad. In order to increase her turnover and to be able to respond well to her customer demand, Théodora has requested and received financial support from Finadev, so that she can maximise her interest and expand her business,

Théodora is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy a bag of corn, 2 bags of rice, 3 bowls of cassava flour, 1/4 box of powdered milk and 1/4 of tinned tomatoes.

loans.name: Kedeme Pélagie

texts.fr: Agée de 32ans, Kedeme Pélagie est mariée et mère de 04 enfants dont 03 sont scolarisés. Le plus âgé a 15ans et le moins âgé a 03ans. Elle s'est spécialisée dans la vente des sacs de maïs depuis quelques années et s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le but d'augmenter son fonds de roulement et de combler les attentes de ses clients, Kedeme Pélagie a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Le gain dégagé par ce crédit lui permettra de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses propres besoins.
texts.en: 32-year-old Kedeme Pélagie is married and the mother of 4 children, 3 of whom attend school. The eldest child is 15 years old and the youngest, 3. Kedeme Pélagie has specialised in selling bags of corn for several years and gets her supplies at one of Benin's markets. In order to increase her working capital and satisfy the expectations of her customers, she has requested and obtained a microloan from Finadev. The profits made thanks to this loan will enable her to contribute to her children's education and to meet her own needs.

loans.use: to buy 25 bags of corn.

loans.name: Rékiath

texts.fr: Agée de 41ans, Rékiath est veuve et mère de trois enfants dont deux sont scolarisés. L'aîné et le benjamin ont respectivement 23ans et 16ans. Elle vend des sacs de maïs depuis quelques années et s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue de renforcer son pouvoir d'achat et de répondre favorablement aux exigences de ses clients, Rékiath a sollicité et a obtenu un concours financier à Finadev. Le bénéfice généré par ce concours financier lui permettra de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et de renforcer son stock de marchandise afin d'éviter les ruptures qui constituent un manque à gagner pour son activité.
texts.en: Rékiath is a 41-year old widow, who is mother to three children, two of whom are at school. The eldest and the youngest are 23 years of age and 16 respectively. She has been selling sacks of corn for several years and gets her supplies in a Benin market. With a view to increase her purchasing power and responding favorably to customer deand, Rékiath has requested and been granted financial support from Finadev. The profits she makes as a result of this financial support will enable her to contribute to her children's education costs and to boost her stock so that she can avoid ruptures of stock which lead to her losing potential income from her business.

loans.use: to buy 25 sacks of corn.

loans.name: Edibi Iyabo Genevieve's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe composé de deux membres en caution solidaire. Agée de 40ans, Iyabo Geneviève la responsable est mariée et mère d'un enfant scolarisé puis âgé de 11ans. Elle vend des tomates en boîte, du savon, des paquets de sucre, de spaghetti et d'autres articles depuis deux ans. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin et de l'extérieur. Dans le but d'accroître sa capacité d'approvisionnement et de répondre favorablement à la demande de ses clients, Iyabo Geneviève a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev en vue de maximiser son bénéfice et de participer à la scolarisation de son enfant. Iyabo Geneviève se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en: This is a group constituting two people who have joint liability. Iyabo Geneviève, who is in charge of the group, is married and mother to one child who is 11 years old and attends school. She has been selling canned tomatoes, soap, packs of sugar, spaghetti and other products for two years. She gets her supplies in a Benin market and abroad. With a view to increasing her capacity to get fresh supplies and to respond favorably to customer demand, Iyabo Geneviève has requested and been granted a loan from Finadev so she can maximise her profits and contribute to her child's schooling costs. Iyabo Geneviève is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy half a carton of canned tomatoes, half a carton of soaps, a quarter of a carton of sugar and a quarter of a carton of spaghetti.

loans.name: Blanche Delphine

texts.fr: Agée de 43ans, Blanche Delphine est mariée et mère de 04 enfants scolarisés dont l'aîné est déjà à l'université. Le plus âgé et le moins ont respectivement 21ans et 10ans. Elle a une boutique où elle vend des produits cosmétiques, des mèches, des spaghettis, des boîtes de conserve et d'autres articles depuis quelques années. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin et de l'extérieur. Dans le souci de renforcer son pouvoir d'achat et de répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Blanche Delphine a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev en vue de maximiser son bénéfice et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en: 43-year-old Blanche Delphine is married and the mother of 4 children who attend school; the eldest is already at university. The eldest and youngest children are 21 and 10 years old respectively. Blanche Delphine has a shop in which she has been selling beauty products, hair extensions, spaghetti, canned goods and other items for several years. She gets her supplies at one of Benin's markets, and from abroad. In order to reinforce her buying power and to respond to her customers' demands, Blanche Delphine has requested and received a loan from Finadev, with a view to maximising her profits and contributing to her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 2 dozen sets of hair extensions, 15 pagnes, 2 boxes of tinned tomatoes, 1 box of spaghetti and 2 boxes of ointment.

loans.name: Odette Kouessiba

texts.fr: Agée de 46ans, Odette Kouessiba est mariée et mère de 03 enfants qui sont déjà à leur propre charge. L'aîné et le benjamin ont respectivement 26ans et 21ans. Elle vend des produits congelés, des bidons d'huile, des bouteilles de mayonnaise et des liqueurs depuis quelques années. Elle s'approvisionne dans les grandes poissonneries et boutiques du Bénin. Dans le but d'accroître son chiffre d'affaire et de répondre favorablement à la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit auprès de Finadev. Le bénéfice généré par ce financement lui permettra de renforcer son commerce et de subvenir à ses propres besoins.
texts.en: 46-year-old Odette Kouessiba is married and the mother of 3 children who are already independent. The eldest and youngest children are 26 and 21 years old respectively. Odette Kouessiba has been selling frozen goods, cans of oil, jars of mayonnaise and liquor for several years. She gets her supplies in the large fishmongers and shops in Benin. In order to increase her turnover and to respond well to her customer demand, she has requested and received a loan from Finadev. The profits generated thanks to this loan will enable her to strengthen her business and meet her own needs.

loans.use: to buy 3 boxes of fish, 2 boxes of liquor, 10 small cans of oil and 2 boxes of jars of mayonnaise.

loans.name: Afiwavi

texts.fr: Agée de 36ans, Afiwavi est mariée et mère de trois enfants dont deux sont scolarisés. Le plus âgé et le moins âgé ont respectivement 10ans et 04ans. Elle a un prêt-à-porter où elle vend des habits, des chaussures, des colliers et des pagnes depuis quelques années puis s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de l'extérieur. En vue de renforcer son pouvoir d'achat et de satisfaire les besoins de sa clientèle, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Ce crédit lui permettra de maximiser son intérêt et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants. Elle souhaiterait agrandir son activité et acheter une parcelle.
texts.en: 36-year-old Afiwavi is married and the mother of 3 children, 2 of whom attend school. The eldest and youngest children and 10 and 4 years old respectively. Afiwavi owns a shop in which she has been selling clothes, shoes, necklaces and pagnes (colourful and decorative West African cloth) for several years. She gets her supplies at one of Benin's markets, and from abroad. In order to strengthen her buying power and satisfy her customer demand, she has requested and received a microloan from Finadev. This loan will allow her to maximise her interest and contribute to her children's education. She would like to expand her business and buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy 10 dresses, 8 pairs of shoes, 20 necklaces and 12 pagnes.

loans.name: Edgardo

texts.es: Edgardo con su anterior credikiva, compró una maquina industrial de codo, y materias primas para producir calzado, como cueros, sintéticos, goma, suelas, herrajes y accesorios. En la actualidad está aplicando aun nuevo crédito mediante el cual comprará materias primas, para elaborar nuevos diseños de calzado, y atender toda la temporada fe fin de año, que llega con muchas fiestas, y con dinero circulante que hacen que Edgardo usualmente realice en esta época sus mejores ventas. Edgardo envía un mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva: “ Agradezco toda ayuda recibida y espero que este programa se extienda por todo el país y el continente. “
texts.en:
Edgardo used his previous CrediKiva loan to buy an industrial machine and raw materials, such as leathers, synthetics, rubber, soles, buckles and accessories to make shoes.  He is now applying for a new loan to buy raw materials to make new shoe designs for the holiday season.  It is a time of much celebration and shopping when Edgardo usually enjoys his best sales period of the year.  

Edgardo's message to Kiva lenders:  "I am grateful for all the help and hope this program extends throughout the country and the continent."

loans.use: To buy raw materials to make new shoe designs for the holiday season.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia de 54 años de edad se dedica a la venta de refrescos y bebidas frías, ella tiene una experiencia desde el año 1970, cuando buscando apoyar los ingresos de su hogar empezó vendiendo gaseosas y mercancías como bolsos, posteriormente agregó la venta de cervezas, pues le ofrecía mayor rentabilidad, negocio en el que finalmente vende no solo al detalle, sino también en un mayor volumen. Sus ventas las realiza a crédito y de contado, especialmente los fines de semana, porque se incrementan, debido a los descansos de los empleados, que optan por beber cervezas y los negocios de licores a los que ella les vende aumentan sus pedidos. En la actualidad está aplicando aun credikiva, para comprar cervezas y gaseosas y aumentar su stock, pues los pedidos se incrementan a propósito del fin de año que se acerca y Julia debe estar preparada para atender a su clientela en esta temporada, que le permite ganar un poco más. Su mayor desafío es no contar con el capital de trabajo suficiente, para en el futuro hacer una habitación donde almacenar los productos en mayor cantidad y convertirse en la mayor distribuidora de su sector y es que este es su gran sueño por el cual trabaja persistentemente y se propone llegar a cumplir.
texts.en:
Julia, 54, sells soft-drinks and cold beverages for a living and has been in business since 1970, when she sought ways to earn extra income for the household and began selling sodas and merchandise such as bags.  Later, she added beer sales because of the higher profit, and ended up selling not only retail but also on a wholesale basis.  She sells both on credit and in cash, especially on weekends which is when employees have time off and can drink beer and the liquor stores increase their orders.

She is currently using her CrediKiva loan to buy beer and sodas to increase her stock for the upcoming holiday season when demand increases; and Julia must be prepared to fill customer orders so she can earn a little more.  Her greatest challenge is not having enough working capital to build a room to store more products and become a larger distributor in the sector.  That is the goal she is working hard to meet some day.

loans.use: To buy beer and sodas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 50 baskets of pineapples and 60 baskets of oranges.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and an embroidery machine.

loans.name: Adewale Justine

texts.fr: Agée de 40ans, Adewale Justine est mariée et mère de 04 enfants scolarisés dans une école de la place. L'aîné a 17ans et le benjamin a 10ans. Elle vend des fournitures scolaires, des colliers et autres articles depuis quelques années puis s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Soucieuse de renforcer son activité et de répondre favorablement aux besoins de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev en vue de maximiser son intérêt et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
40-year-old Adewale Justine is married and the mother of 4 children who attend a local school. The eldest child is 17 years old and the youngest, 10.

Adewale Justine has been selling school supplies, necklaces and other items for several years and gets her supplies at one of the markets in Benin. In order to strengthen her business and respond well to the needs of her customers, she has requested and received a microloan from Finadev, with a view to maximising her interest and contributing to her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 20 necklaces and 2 boxes of notebooks.

loans.name: Rahmonali

texts.ru: Рахмонали проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 22 года. Он холост. Рахмонали живет с родителями. Он раньше не работал. Сейчас Рахмонали берет кредит для закупа телят и коровы, чтобы начать свой бизнес. Он намерен заняться купле - продажей крупнорогатого скота. Рахмонали заранее благодарит всех, кто его поддержат и верят в то, что он сможет встать на ноги!
texts.en: Rahmonali lives in the Jilikul region. He is 22 years old, single, and lives with his parents. He is currently not working. Rahmonali is now seeking a loan to buy calves and cows so he can start his own business. He intends to get into buying and selling cattle. Rahmonali thanks in advance all those who support him and believe that he can get back on his feet!

loans.use: to buy calves and cows

loans.name: Sarvar

texts.ru: Сарвар является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Ей 45 лет. Она вдова и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. После смерти мужа ей было очень трудно справляться с обеспечением детей. Она занималась выращиванием сельхоз культур, но доход от ее деятельности не хватало для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Сарвар решила организовать новый бизнес для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей скота. Скотоводство очень развита в ее районе, и она имеет большой шанс развевать свой бизнес и получить большой доход.  От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей новыми технологиями. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sarvar is one of those people who tries to improve their standard of living and jump-start the economic situation of their family. She is a 45-year-old widow with 2 children. After the death of her husband, it was very difficult for her to manage to provide for her children. She grew crops for a living, but her earnings from this activity were not enough for her to buy all the basic necessities for her kids. Sarvar has decided to set up a new business for the welfare of her family. For this reason, she took a course entitled "Get Ahead" that was organized by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she earned a certificate. She wants to get into the field of buying and selling cattle. Animal husbandry is a very developed business where she lives, and there is a lot of opportunity for her to make a good income. She plans to use the money generated by this loan to get the latest technology for her children. Sarvar is seeking a loan of 500 Tajikistan Somoni to buy cattle so she can start up her business. She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle to set up a new business

loans.name: Ponciana

texts.en:
Ponciana is a merchant from Panglao, Bohol. She earns a living by selling coconut wine. She keeps some coconut wines in order to ferment and turn them into vinegar. She is also engaged in a hog-raising business.

Ponciana needs a loan to buy more coconut wine and feed for her pigs. With this, she will be able to improve her income.

In the future, Ponciana hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more coconut wine and feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en: Claudine is 30 years old. She is married to a technician and they have five children, all of whom go to school. With this loan, she plans to increase her inventory of clothes, which she has been selling for the past three years. She will increase her savings with the profits from this business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Nasibakhon

texts.ru: Насибахон женщина, которая любит трудиться, и активно участвует во всех сферах современной жизни. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж очень добрый человек и работает экономистом в заводе. Насибахон работает заведующим отдел кадров поликлиники своего города. Она очень умная и имеет высшее образование. Ее старший сын трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и каждый месяц отправляет им деньги на жизнь. Не смотря на все усилия их семейный доход, не позволяет им купить все не обходимые средства для проживания. Насибахон хочет купить зимнюю одежду для себя и детей, то есть пальто и куртки, но не имеет денег для этого. Зима на севере Таджикистана довольно холодная, а у этой семьи нет теплой одежды. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки зимних одежд. Этот займ поможет ей купить одежду и таким образом беречь себя и детей от холода. Она обещает погасить займ во время. Она ждет и надеется только на вас.
texts.en: Nasibakhon is a woman who loves to work and who takes active part in all facets of modern life. She is married and has 3 children. Her husband is a kind man who works as an economist at a factory. Nasibakhon is the head of the human resources department at the polyclinic in her hometown. She is very intelligent, and has a post-secondary education. Her eldest son is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation, and every month he sends money home to help out. However, despite all their efforts, their combined family income is not sufficient for them to cover all their living expenses. Nasibakhon wants to buy winter wear, namely coats and jackets, for herself and her children, but she does not have enough money to do so. Winters in northern Tajikistan are quite cold, but this family does not have warm clothing. Nasibakhon is seeking a loan of 1,000 Tajikistan Somoni to buy winter wear. This loan will help her to buy clothes that will enable her to protect her children from the cold, and she promises to pay it off on time. All her hopes are on you.

loans.use: To buy winter clothes for herself and her children

loans.name: Enkhbadral

texts.en: Enkhbadral, 23, lives with his wife and daughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. In 2011, he graduated from university with a marketing manager degree and began his photo studio business. Even though one year is a very short time, his business stabilized and attracted quite a number of customers. The family resides in his brother’s apartment and his daughter, who is one, is cared for by his mother, who is retired. His wife recently began working as an accountant in a private company after caring for her daughter for one year. In order to expand his business and generate more income, he is requesting a loan of 3000000 MNT to buy a printing device with multiple functions. He is a very hardworking individual who is striving to improve his family’s living conditions. On one occasion, he even said, ‘’Real life has just begun as I graduated my university, got married and had a child," which shows his determination and enthusiasm.

loans.use: to buy a printing device for his photo studio.

loans.name: Shamilla

texts.en: Shamilla is a mother of four children. She is 39 years old. She sells Bibles and books of songs. She has been in this business for 10 years. She wants this loan to add more Bibles to sell. She will use her profits to increase her savings.

loans.use: to add more bibles to sell.

loans.name: Eddah

texts.en:
Eddah, 22, is a farmer in Litein County, Kenya, where she lives with her husband and one child who has not yet started school. She has been farming for the past three years, producing milk and tea, which she sells at the local market in her area. She buys and sells tea as an additional source of income.

She is requesting for 30,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds. She will earn extra income from selling the products, which will boost her livelihood and help her in to provide for her family's needs with ease. She aspires to buy a second cow within the next five years.

Poor weather conditions and poor infrastructure are her major challenges in farming.

Eddah is very thankful to Juhudi Kilimo for funding her with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase poultry birds.

loans.name: Norovnyam

texts.en: Norovnyam, 22, lives with her family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She graduated from secretary school in 2007, and since 2008 she has been working as an operator in a state law institution. Her husband works as a construction decorator in a small private company. She purchased a gas engine automobile from her relative who runs an automobile-importing business. The automobile she purchased came to Mongolia on December 4th, 2012. However, due to lack of funds, she can't make the final payment. Therefore, she is requesting a loan of 3000000 MNT to pay the remaining fee. As a result, she and her husband can work enthusiastically without having to pay for taxi services. Also, this type of automobile emits less smoke, thus contributing to efforts against air pollution.

loans.use: to finish paying for her car.

loans.name: Peninna

texts.en:
Peninna, a 29-year-old single mother of a four-year-old attending school, lives in the town of Kakata town where, for the past five years, she has been operating a little market table selling eggs, bread, etc, Peninna started this business with help from her mother, and she enjoys it because she has many customers.

In order to expand her enterprise, Peninna is requesting a loan to purchase eggs, bread, etc, She plans to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase eggs, bread etc. so she can expand her business.

loans.name: Alimanjani

texts.en: Alimanjani is a thirty-six-year-old hardworking man with two children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. For five years now, he has been selling cocoa, and the business has been very lucrative. He sells cocoa directly to the factory, which buys at a higher price. Like most good fathers, he desires to educate his children through university and set up income-generating activities for them. Alimanjani intends to use this loan to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Flaviano

texts.en:
Flaviano is a 55-year-old married man from Talibon, Bohol. He has been engaged in seaweed farming for 12 years now. This is the source of his income. His wife is a teacher.

Flaviano is requesting a loan to buy seaweed and straw. With this loan, he will be able to plant more seaweed in his community area.

In the future, Flaviano dreams of expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy seaweed and straw.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замире 34 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Она живет с детьми в старом доме, а ее муж уехал в Российскую Федерацию, и не помогает жене отремонтировать дом. Это проблема у них существует уже несколько лет, но решить они не могут, так как их доход маленький. Замира уже несколько лет работает в частной фирме. Она использует свою зарплату для содержания семьи, так как в настоящее время содержать 2 детей тоже не легко, и требует массу денег. Замира раньше кредитовалась в нашей организации и имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Она реализовала свои планы с помощью займов, которых она получала от ИМОН. На этот раз она тоже решила получить займ и отремонтировать свой дом, так как она больше не надеется на мужа. Она должна отремонтировать комнаты детей, кухню. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  2000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта дома.  Замира и ее дети будут ждать, пока добрые кредиторы помогут им решить проблему жилья.
texts.en: Zamira is 34 years old, married, and has 2 children. She and her children live in an old house, but her husband has left for the Russian Federation and does not help his wife with the home repairs. They have had this housing problem for several years, but have been unable to deal with it because they have a low salary. Zamira has been working in a private company for several years. Her income goes towards providing for her family because supporting 2 children in today's world is not easy and requires a great deal of money. Zamira has taken out loans from our organisation before and has a good credit history. She fulfilled all the plans that she had hoped to with the help of her previous loans from IMON. This time, she has decided to take another loan so she can repair her house, because she no longer hopes for support from her husband. She needs to carry out repairs in her children's rooms and the kitchen. Zamira is seeking a loan of 2,000 Tajikistan Somoni to buy building materials for home repairs. She and her children will wait for kind lenders to help them resolve their housing problems.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair her house

loans.name: Farangis

texts.ru: Фарангису 31 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина. С детства она имела конкретные цели и старалась реализовать их. У нее была заветная детская мечта стать модельером как «Мария Лопес». Это мечта заставила ее научится шитью женской одежды. Уже несколько лет она имеет опыт в данной работе и 4 месяца назад она организовала свой бизнес. Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она очень старается развевать бизнес и получить хороший доход, но у нее не получается, так как швейная машинка у нее очень старая и шьет не красиво. Ее клиентки уже несколько раз сделали замечания. Если она не будет обновлять свою швейную машинку, то все ее клиентки уйдут к другим портнихам. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы развевать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Farangis is 31 years old, married, and has 1 child. She is a very hard-working woman. From a young age she has had specific goals and has tried to realise them. She had a cherished childhood dream of becoming a fashion designer like Maria Lopez. This dream led her to learn now to sew women's clothing. For several years, she has gained experience in this field, and 4 months ago, she set up her own business. She took a course entitled "Get Ahead" that was organised by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she received a certificate. She has been trying very hard to develop her business but has not yet been able to because her sewing machine is very old and does a poor job. Her clients have made several complaints. If she cannot get a new sewing machine, her clients will start going to a different seamstress. Farangis is seeking a loan of 500 Tajikistan Somoni to buy a sewing machine to develop her new business. She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine to develop her new business

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en: Vicent is a thirty-eight-year-old married man with eight children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. Nine years ago, he decided to venture into farming; he specifically grows cocoa. The demand for the crop is overwhelming, and his farm can no longer sufficiently supply his customers. Therefore, he now buys from other farmers and sells at a profit. Inadequate labor and high transportation costs are his major challenges, while his dream is to buy more land and expand his plantation. Vicent is requesting a loan to buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a water tank.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en: Alice still runs her boutique and M-PESA. The two businesses are doing great. She has borrowed a loan of KES 50,000 from KADET LTD, which she intends to use to pay the school fees for her children. Alice serviced her previous loan well and in good time. This is her second loan from KADET LTD.

loans.use: To pay the school fees for her children.

loans.name: Sinforiano

texts.en:
Sinforiano is a 54-year-old married man and a father of four children. He is from Cortes, Bohol. He has earned a living through his sari-sari (convenience store) or variety store business for several years now. 

Sinforiano is asking for a loan to buy stock to sell in his store such as canned goods, sodas, biscuits, candies and toiletries. With this additional inventory, he will be able to attract and cater to more customers in his store.

In the future, Sinforiano dreams of making his business a success.

loans.use: to buy stock to sell in his store such as canned goods, sodas, biscuits, candies and toiletries.

loans.name: Astrit

texts.en:
Astrit is 27 years old, single, and lives in the northwest part of Albania where he was raised in a family that falls below the extreme poverty level according to the country’s index. Although Involved in livestock-raising and selling dairy products particularly delicious goat cheese to locals, Astrit can only offer to his family a small income enough to cover only the very basics. He is the only one to provide an income to his family of seven, which includes his siblings and parents.

Astrit was recently selected by World Vision Albania to receive some additional help to establish an activity that would make him self-sustaining. He wants to buy more goats with this loan of 300,000 Albanian Lek.

loans.use: to add more goats to existing herd.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: El Sr. Francisco sigue con la actividad de producción y venta de ladrillos, cuenta que le fue muy bien con el anterior credito, en esta ocacion el préstamo lo va a utilizar para la compra de insumos y materiales  para la fabricación de ladrillos como leña y tierra,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es un pedido de ladrillos que tiene que entregar y que por falta de capital no lo puede realizar, el Sr. Francisco es una persona muy trabajadora.
texts.en: Francisco continues to work making and selling bricks.  Given that his last loan was very good for him, this time he will use his loan to buy supplies and materials, such as firewood and earth, for making bricks.  Francisco is asking for this loan as he has a big order and does not have the capital to fulfill it.  He is very hardworking.

loans.use: to buy firewood and earth.

loans.name: Ma. Nida

texts.en:
This is Ma. Nida, age 45, who is a resident of Payatas, Philippines. She is married to Perfecto, a fabricator, and a mother to her children. She, along with her husband and children, manages her household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to save for the future of her children.

Ma. Nida operates a community pharmacy store. She retails basic medicines and vitamins to the community. She earns money by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling them piecemeal. Aside from this, she also sells mineral water for added income. Her store is adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community members. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operating her business, Nida is requesting a PHP 12,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy additional stock of medicines and mineral water to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Ma. Nida hopes to be able to expand soon and dreams of giving her children a good and high-quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group comprises 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more stock of medicines and mineral water needed in her pharmacy business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cutlery and plates for her business.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
Ms Saima is a 27-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. The man shown in the photo is Saima’s husband, who has been driving a rickshaw for two years to meet the expenses of family members.

Saima, who has been in association with Kashf for two years and has shown an excellent repayment history, has requested a loan of Rs 15000 to buy new tires for her husband’s vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers.

Saima dreams of providing a quality education to her children, and she is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband’s vehicle.

loans.name: Manegbeh

texts.en:
Manegbeh is 40 years old and lives in the Kakata community with her husband. She is the mother of four children, who are between the ages of 8 and 26 years old. One of her children stays at home, while the other three children live outside her home and are independent.

For the past ten years she has been running a grocery store, where she sells toothpaste, soft drinks, tissue, bath soap, water, and many other items. She is able to generate profits because she has a lot of customers, especially during the dry season when her daily sales are very high. She sells her goods twelve hours a day, and she transports the goods to her business area by commercial vehicle.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more cartons of toothpaste, tissue, bath soap, mineral water, and soft drinks for her business. Her dream is to expand her business and to provide her children with a higher level of education.

loans.use: to expand her business by purchasing additional inventory (e.g., toothpaste, tissue, bath soap, mineral water, and soft drinks)

loans.name: Salume

texts.en:
Salume is a resident of Kitale in Western Kenya, where she lives with her four children. Three of her children are still in school.

She has ten years of experience in the agricultural/farming business. She runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. She primarily supplies milk, maize, and beans to the local market. She explains that the existence of animal diseases is her main business challenge.

Salume has requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her buy more poultry birds. The additional income she expects to generate as a result of the loan will help her pay for family's basic needs, especially food. In the future, she plans to have a farm of at least two thousand birds and three dairy cows.

loans.use: To expand and improve her business by purchasing additional poultry birds

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is a 26-year-old married woman from Cortes, Bohol. She is the mother of two young children.

For almost four years she has been engaged in the food vending business. Specifically, she sells home-cooked food to customers in her place.

Mary Jane is asking for a loan to buy more ingredients for her food vending business, including sugar, flour, and cooking oil. With the additional ingredients, she will be able to cook and sell more food, which ought to increase her sales and profits. In the future, Mary Jane aims of expanding her business in order to generate more income and to be able to save more money for her children's education.

loans.use: to expand her food vending business by purchasing additional ingredients (e.g., sugar, flour, and cooking oil)

loans.name: Pedrita

texts.en: Pedrita, 52 years old, has been engaged in rice farming in Antequera, Bohol for several years now. She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm in order to improve her harvest. In the future, Pedrita hopes to make her farming business a success.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es:
En el municipio del Sauce un pequeño pueblo, donde existen diversas actividades comerciales, es aquí donde habita la señora Teresa de Jesús de 44 años de edad.

Teresa es casada cuenta con dos hijos bajo su cargo y sus principales  funciones es desempeñar el cargo como comerciante en su propia casa de habitación.

 Mantiene a sus adorados hijos y asegura que vallan a la escuela. 

Solo cuenta con su buena salud, su capacidad de trabajo, y su pequeño negocio como es la pulpería que la ha ido desarrollando con créditos que le han financiado solicita un crédito a  ceprodel para el desarrollo de su negociocon la compra de Maíz, Frijoles, Azúcar, Aceite, Arroz, ella considera de mucha importancia, para el desarrollo de su familia.  

 "Agradezco a Dios como primer instancia por haberme encontrado con Ceprodel y Kiva, para que estos me sigan dando la mano amigable para seguir adelante".
texts.en:
In the small town of Sauce, there are all sorts of businesses.  It is here in Sauce that 44-year-old Teresa de Jesús lives.  

Teresa is married with two children and she runs a shop out of her own house.

She looks after her much loved children and makes sure that they attend school.

She counts on her good health, her ability to work and her little grocery store which has been progressing with the loans that have financed it.  She is looking for a loan from Ceprodel for her business to grow and she will use it to buy corn, beans, sugar, oil and rice. She thinks it will be very important for her family to progress.

She says, "First I thank God for having found out about Ceprodel and Kiva, because they are offering a kind hand so that I can make progress."

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, sugar, oil, rice, etc.

loans.name: Hurmat

texts.ru:
Хурмату 49 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Ее муж работает мельником, а она сама занималась выращиванием сельхоз культуры. Год за годом дети требует все больше благ и ее доход не хватает для содержания детей. Ее муж тоже получает маленький доход. Хурмат решила организовать новый бизнес.
С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей скота, так как скотоводство имеет большой спрос в ее районе. Она будет покупать скот присматривать за ним несколько месяцев и потом продавать по более высокой цене, чем она приобрела его, и таким образом получать доход. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Hurmat is 49 years old, married, and has 4 children. Her husband is a miller, and she grows crops. With each passing year, her children need more things and her earnings are not sufficient to cover the costs of providing for her kids. Her husband's income is also small. 
Hurmat has decided to set up her own business. For this reason, she took a course entitled "Get Ahead" that was organised by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she received a certificate. Now she is fully capable of setting up her own business and becoming successful at it. She wants to get into the business of raising and selling cattle because there is great demand for animal husbandry in her region. She will buy cattle, raise them, then later re-sell them for a profit, thereby earning an income. She plans to use the money generated by this loan to provide her children with a good education and nutritious food. Hurmat is seeking a loan of 500 Tajikistan Somoni to buy cattle to get her new business started. She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle to set up a new business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand and improve her farming business by purchasing and and insuring a dairy cow

loans.name: Seltina

texts.en:
Seltina is a 43-year-old farmer living in Kitale, Kenya with her husband and four children. Three of her children are currently in school.

For the past four years she has been engaged in the agricultural/farming business. Specifically, she produces maize, milk, and horticultural products, which she sells at the local market in her area. She explains that she runs a green grocery as an additional source of income. Her major business challenges are unpredictable rainfall and market prices, as well as high production costs.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 30,000 KES loan from Juhudi kilimo to purchase poultry birds. She believes that the birds will enable her to earn extra income, which would boost her family's income and help to pay for her children's education. In the next five years she hopes to double her farm products. Seltina is grateful to Juhudi kilimo for helping her to seek additional funding.

loans.use: To expand and improve her business by purchasing poultry birds

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Sajida is a 44-year-old married mother of six children. She has been had a stitching business for four years. She is very familiar with stitching techniques, and she stitches for half of the people of her community. She is contributing enough to the family income to support the needs of the family members.

In order to cope with the demands of her customers, she requested a loan of 25,000 PKR to purchase spools of thread and packs of buttons, zippers and lace in various colors. These materials will help her to generate more income. She wishes to spend the revenue to better her family members' lives.

loans.use: to purchase spools of thread and packs of buttons, zippers and lace in various colors.

loans.name: Sander Fernando

texts.es: El Sr. Sander  tiene 24 años tiene un hijo de la edad de 3  años, El Sr. Sander  se dedica  a la   fabricación de variedad de Calzados, para cholitas, tiene su taller en la zona de Alto Chijini de la  ciudad de La Paz,  este préstamo es su  primera secuencia  dentro de la institución, El Sr. Sander  va a utilizar este préstamo para la compra de lonjas de cuero por mayor y materiales para la fabricación de sus calzados  y así de esta manera ofrecer variedad de calzados a su clientela, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, El Sr. Sander  va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando variedad de material, El Sr. Sander  es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Sander, 24, has a son, 3.  Sander earns a living making a variety of "cholita" shoes.  His shop is in the Alto Chijini area of the city of La Paz.

This loan is his first sequence with the institution.  Sander's going to use this loan to buy strips of leather wholesale and materials to make his shoes so he can offer his customers a variety.  His reason for requesting this loan is to continue improving in his business.  Sander's going to use the profits to continue buying a variety of material.

Sander's a very hardworking person.  He's happy about this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy strips of leather wholesale

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 39-year-old single man from Lebanon who lives with his parents and five siblings. The entire family except Ibrahim’s mother cooperate together financially to satisfy their life needs. 

Ibrahim has worked in the construction field since 1992 and has been able over the years to hire four full-time employees who benefit from fair salaries that allow them to support their families as well. 

Today, he is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase scaffolding and other equipment and supplies. He wants to get prepared to satisfy clients' demands. In the future, he hopes to take additional multiple construction projects in order to further expand his business operations.

loans.use: to purchase scaffolding and other equipment and supplies.

loans.name: Mohammad Hussein

texts.en:
Mohammad Hussein is a 19-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents. His father is the one taking care of the family and seeking to offer them a respectable way of living. 

Mohammad Hussein owns a motorcycle repair shop. His job consists of repairing motorcycle bodies from accidents and damages. And in order to get additional income, he decided today to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase added spare parts. This will facilitate his work, allowing him to attract added customers and make a fair income. 

In the future, he is planning to enlarge his shop where he can sell spare parts for new motorcycles.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es: Felipa de 56 años tiene un negocio donde vende de todo un poco, cervezas, papelería, detalles para el hogar, servicios de internet y telecomunicaciones, en un espacio ubicado en su domicilio, donde habita con su cónyuge y sus 4 hijos en las edades de 10 a 20 años.  Felipa inició su vida de emprendimiento comprando una caja de cervezas, que vendió al detalle y obtuvo de manera inmediata utilidades que la entusiasmaron para reinvertir y aumentar su oferta poco a poco con otros artículos como mercancías variadas, accesorios femeninos, papelería y hasta agregó un café internet. Sus ventas las realiza de contado y también tiene una clientela de clientes a los que vende a crédito, pero antes de otorgarle financiamiento observa su comportamiento para gradualmente darle esta opción. Su día de trabajo inicia desde las 7 de la mañana hasta la 10 de la noche, porque trabaja con mucho esmero, pues tiene el gran propósito en un futuro, de hacer una segunda planta a su casa, para independizar su vida personal de su espacio productivo y tener un mayor sosiego.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará cervezas por cajas, para distribuirlas en las tiendas y establecimientos comerciales, aprovechando las fiestas que se acercan, época en la cual el consumo aumenta, mientras en estos negocios se termina muy pronto los inventarios de bebidas dejando de vender en su máximo potencial. Así mismo comprará, para atender la demanda de su mercado,  ropa, calzado y detalles femeninos, para que los clientes y sus familias, se vistan muy elegantes y reciban las navidades y el año nuevo, con ropa que ha comprado en la miscelánea de Felipa que le permite a ella ganar un poco más de lo acostumbrado, como ocurre siempre a final del año.
texts.en:
Felipa is 56 years old and has a business in which she sells a little of everything, including beer, stationery, accessories for the home, internet services and telecommunications.  Her business is located in a part of her home, where she lives with her spouse and four children, who are between the ages of 10 and 20 years.  Felipa began her life as an entrepreneur by buying a crate of beer which she then sold retail.  The immediate profits she earned from this venture encouraged her to reinvest and gradually increase her product line with various merchandise, such as women’s accessories, stationary and even an internet café.  Most of her sales are done on a cash basis, although she also has customers to whom she sells on credit, but before offering financing she observes their behavior and only gradually gives them this option.  Her workday begins at 7 am and lasts until 10 pm.  She puts a lot of effort into her business because she is determined to add a second floor to her home so that she can separate her personal life from her workspace and have some more peace.

Felipa is currently applying for a Kiva loan, which is her first financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the loan to buy beer by the crate, which she will distribute through stores and commercial establishments.  She plans to make good use of the approaching holiday season when consumption increases and inventories of drinks are exhausted very quickly at a time of maximum selling potential.  At the same time, in order to satisfy the demand of her customers, she will buy clothing, footwear and women’s accessories, so that her customers and their families will be well dressed for Christmas and New Year with clothing from her shop.  This will allow her to earn a little more than the usual, as always occurs at year end.

loans.use: to buy beer by the crate, clothing, footwear and women’s accessories.

loans.name: Muradi

texts.en:
Muradi is from the Terjola district. He is 41 years old and lives with his wife, his retired mother and three children. The family earns their living through an agricultural business. They run a small dairy farm with two milk cows, whose milk is used in cheese products. He sells the dairy products at the local open market. In addition to the dairy cows, the family owns a vineyard and grows different kinds of vegetables on the family-owned land. They do all the relevant agricultural work to ensure a good quality of harvest. The harvested products are sold locally. 

He works hard to earn some savings and improve the living conditions for his family. 

Muradi requested a loan for purchasing an additional milking cow. He will be able to produce and sell more cheese. Thus, he wants to expand his business in order to earn a good profit. With increased profits, he will be able to reinvest in his agricultural business, as well as spend more on the family’s daily needs, and the living conditions for the family will be improved.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 39 years old and married to Martin, who contributes to the family income. They have six children. She has been running a business of rental houses for a period of about eight years with an income of about 40,000 KES (Kenyan shillings).

She wants to use the loan to construct more rental rooms. She hopes to buy another piece of land and develop it to add on to her income.

loans.use: to construct extra rental rooms.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a very strong woman, aged 35, residing in Kakoba, a suburb of the Mbarara municipality. After losing her first husband, with whom she had two children, she got married to another man who does not care about the survival of the family members. Due to such situation, she started a business of meat roasting to enable her to survive with her children. 

This business has grown to an extent that she has managed to build a simple house to accommodate her family. 

She now wants a loan of 1,000,000 Uganda shillings to buy goats for slaughtering. The remaining balance will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy goats that she will slaughter to sell roasted meat.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel is a 58-year-old fish vendor from Panglao, Bohol. She has been in the business for several years now. This is the source of her income.

Isabel is asking for a loan to buy more fish to sell to the people in her place. Isabel believes that this loan will allow her to improve her business.

In the future, Isabel hopes to make her business a success and experience the fullness of life together with her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Khoder

texts.en:
Khoder is a 24-year-old Lebanese single man living with one parent. 

One year ago, he was able to open his own shop where he sells women's clothes. He is well known for top-quality clothes and distinguished from other traders by offering a traditional item calling “Aabaya.” He has employed a saleswoman whose responsibility is welcoming customers and helping them choose their desired styles. 

Today, Khoder is requesting a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase high-quality products at low prices. He’s certain that the loan will help him diversify his merchandise selection, which will attract more customers and therefore increase his business sales and thus his income. 

In the future, he is hoping to also sell shoes at his store.

loans.use: to purchase high-quality products at low prices.

loans.name: Moussa

texts.en:
Moussa is a 49-year-old man. He’s Lebanese and married to Souad, a lovely wife and the mother of his five children. She is a great support for him and ready to show help whenever needed. Moussa’s youngest children are also working to supplement the family’s income. 

As for him, he has been working in selling fresh milk to the neighboring villages. He raises cows from which he obtains dairy products. He has been involved in this domain for many years; he knows very well how to manage his work in a good way. 

For this reason, he wanted to take a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new milk machines. They will speed up the milk production and facilitate his business operations. In his opinion, this step will allow him improve his productivity, therefore his earnings and thus his whole way of living. 

Because of his good products, Moussa thinks he may open a small shop where he can sell all kinds of dairy products.

loans.use: to purchase new milk machines.

loans.name: Saer

texts.en:
Saer is a Lebanese married man. He’s 46 year old. He lives with his wife and three school-age children at their house located in one of the most beautiful villages of Lebanon. Both he and his wife manage their household. 

On a daily basis, Saer is working nonstop to provide his family with income. He has been working in his own bakery for many years. He has loyal customers always asking for his delightful bread. 

Today, he has the intention to borrow a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy a big quantity of flour for his bakery. He needs to increase his production and expand his product inventory. He expects a boost in his business income as he expands his business. In the near future, he thinks of taking more Kiva loans to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy a big quantity of flour for his bakery.

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
Sawsan is a 52-year-old Lebanese woman. She’s married, living with her husband and five children. Two are working and the others are still attending school. She, together with her husband, manages the family’s own household expenses while operating her business. 

She has been working in selling cleaning products. She sells different types of detergents such as those for floors, windows, glasses, toilets and home appliances. She also sells body lotions and makeup. She works independently, and visits her customers at their places. 

Sawsan keeps on working very hard in order to maintain her family’s financial status at a good level. Today, she is requesting a loan loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l. to expand her product inventory of detergents and beauty products. She confirms that the loan will help her boost her sales and thus her income by 15%.

loans.use: to expand her product inventory of detergents and beauty products.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah, 49, lives in the Kakata community with her husband and four children. Her children are between the ages of 7 and 19 and are attending school.

Sarah is a hard-working woman. For the past seven years she has been selling flour, sardines, biscuits, meat, cooking oil, and many other items. Her husband is a security guard. He give her the initial capital to start in this business. 

She makes a profit when she sells because she has a lot of customers and because of the location of her business. She thanks the lenders for the support they are giving her business. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase more sardines, biscuits, meat and flour for the business. Her plan is to give her children a better education.

loans.use: to purchase more sardines, biscuits, meat and flour for the business.

loans.name: Ibadat

texts.en:
Ibadat is a very enterprising man, working as a barber for more than 22 years. He is 41, married, and has a big family of five children and his spouse. Three of his children are attending school . 

In order to provide support and earn a better income for his family, Ibadat works hard to increase the number of his customers and to offer better quality service. He needs a loan for 1600 AZN which he will spend on home repairs that will make his children happy. 

Ibadat is a responsible father and hard-working man who likes writing poetry and singing songs for his soul when resting.

loans.use: to make home repairs.

loans.name: Praxedes

texts.en:
Praxedes is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother of seven children from Loon, Bohol, Philippines. Praxedes has earned a living through her sari-sari (or variety store) business for several years now. She sell various goods and commodities to the people in her community.

Praxedes needs a loan to buy more stock to sell in her store, like canned goods, noodles, biscuits, soap and toiletries. 

In the future, Praxedes has hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her store, like canned goods, noodles, biscuits, soap and toiletries,

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en:
Ms. Sakina is a 55-year-old widow. She has been successfully running a small general store in her community for the last five years. She offers various goods for daily use. She has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. Her husband died ten years ago, and she faced a lot of crises soon after the death of her husband. This compelled her to initiate her own business to support the needs of her children.

She is a mother of one son and one daughter. She is motivated to provide for her family. Her son also helps her in her business. As she wants to grow her business, she requested a loan of 20,000 Rs (Pakistan rupees) to buy stock of rice, grains and flour from the market at lower rates. She then would be able to meet with the increasing customer demand consistently. She wishes to utilize the part of revenues to deal with personal expenses and to increase business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice, grains and flour from the market at lower rates.

loans.name: Valekh

texts.en:
Valekh is 35 years old. He lives in the small village of Bolnisi district with his wife. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a plot of agricultural land, where potatoes, tomatoes and cucumbers are grown. 

They do all the agricultural work: cultivating the land, sowing the seeds and harvesting. The harvested products are sold locally at a good price. 

Valekh has a rich experience in his business. He requested a loan for purchasing the seeds of potatoes. After buying the seeds, he will be able to sow and sell the harvested potatoes. It will increase the income of the family. With increased income, they will be able to improve their living conditions. Valekh awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase the seeds of potatoes.

loans.name: José Dolores

texts.es:
En el Municipio de Santa Rosa del Peñón una preciosa ciudad dedicada en diferentes actividades ubicada en el departamento de León, el Joven José Dolores es conocido como una persona honrada, responsable, honesta y dedicada al trabajo.

José Dolores de 31 años, nacido y criado en este bello municipio, se dedica a brindarle su servicio de enseñanza a estudiante de la primaria  en uno de los ministerio de educación, cuenta con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su esposa no cuenta con ningún empleo únicamente es ama de casa.

Con lo poco del salario que el gana como Maestro, no puede construir un pequeño anexo a su vivienda ya que son sus sueños ampliarla más debido a que cuando empezaron eran dos hoy en día son cuatro, su local es muy pequeño se merece ampliarlo más para a que la familia viva mas cómoda, es por eso que solicita financiamiento de Ceprodel y Kiva.

 Dicho crédito lo estará invirtiendo en la copra de Cementó, Arena, Ladrillo y pago de mano de obra, sus principales sueños es construir un dormitorio que le dará mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.

 El estima que para el próximo año su vivienda estará mejor, pero para entonces necesita que Ceprodel y Kiva le brinden este tipo de crédito, de momento solo cuenta con su buena salud, su capacidad de trabajo, y su honradez.

"Agradezco a Dios como primer instancia por haberme encontrado con Ceprodel y Kiva, para que estos me sigan dando su ayuda que tanto necesito".
texts.en:
In the municipality of Santa Rosa del Peñón, a beautiful city located in the León region, different economic activities take place. There, José Dolores, a young man, is known as an honorable, responsible, honest and hardworking person.

José Dolores is thirty-one years old; he was born and raised in this municipality and works as a primary-school teacher for the Ministry of Education. He has two children to take care of and his wife does not work, she takes care of the household chores.

With the little money he makes as a teacher, he is not able to build a small annex to his house. His dream is to expand it, since they were fewer when they started, but they are four now. His house is small and needs to be expanded in order to live more comfortably. This is why he is requesting a loan from Ceprodel and Kiva.

He will use this loan to buy cement, sand and bricks and to pay for labor costs. His biggest dream is to build a bedroom that will improve the quality of life of his family. He expects that by next year, his house will be in better conditions, but for this he needs the loan from Ceprodel and Kiva. At the moment, he only has his good health, his capacity to work and his honesty.

"Firstly, I want to thank God for helping me to find Ceprodel and Kiva, as they will continue to give me the help I need."

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and bricks and to pay for the labor costs.

loans.name: Tojiddin

texts.ru: Тоджидинну 29 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Его жена Саломат очень добрая женщина и является хорошей домохозяйкой. Его дети не совершеннолетние и поэтому Тоджиддин является единственным кормильцем в семье.
